FOCUS  is  a  Post-Trade  Derivative  System.  It  is  a  large  SOA  system  mainly
consisting  of  JMS  based  components.  FIS  acquired  individual  system  from
Barclays and Credit Suisse, after which our team consolidated it into one solution.
Focus  is  a  system  which  interacts  with  Clearing  system  as  well  as  Books  and
Record systems. It enriches as well as manages static setup for the trades coming
from front office systems before sending them to CV & then to Ransys/GMI.

AT&T  is  a  leader  telecom  company  in  US  and  Canada.  This  project  involves
development  and  enhancement  of At&t  web  application. This  application  serves
as  one  stop  shop  for  all  types  of  postpaid  connections.  Existing  customer  can
create their login and manage their account online as well as new customers can
avail  for  new  connection.  This  is  a  web-based  application  which  involves  both
desktop and mobile view, so that customers can access it on virtually any device.
